channel.title: 06 Remake - [ RuneScape We loved Is Back ]
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/33v23a0.png[/img]
Hello. Welcome to the development thread for 06 Remake. 06 Remake started out with just one
developer and then became jam packed with coders and programmers and the server is almost
complete!
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/k4ck7m.png[/img][b]Links[/b] [center][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ngbtqg.png[/img][url=http://tinyurl.com/remake06][size=14pt]Register Here[/size][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ngbtqg.png[/img][/url]
[center][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/k9zyix.png[/img][url=http://tinyurl.com/remake06][size=14pt]Forums[/size][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/k9zyix.png[/img][/url] [/center]
I`ve been working on this for a bit, and this is what I got out:
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/k9zyix.png[/img][b]Features[/b]
[ul][li]Fishing Base[/li] [li]WoodCutting started from scratch[/li] [li]Full Herblore[/li] [li]Crafting (cutting Gems/leatherCrafting needs to be worked on.) - Level reqs,
XP[/li] [li]Prayer[/li] [li]Fixed the shortbow glitch[/li] [li]Fixed ground item stacking[/li] [li]Fixed the equipment bug[/li] [li]All emotions[/li] [li]Teleporting[/li] [li]Teleporting with level requirments[/li] [li]Eating[/li] [li]Potioning- You can drink potions and all, just need to make so it power/etc up
your skills..[/li] [li]Animation/gfx support[/li] [li]Few shops[/li] [li]Npc spawns[/li] [li]Loads global objects[/li] [li]Started a skilling base[/li] [li]Messaging[/li] [li]Split Chat[/li] [li]Wielding Level requirments[/li] [li]PlayerEditor - edits a char file[/li] [li]Fletching with interfaces[/li] [li]Cooking with Interfaces, almost all raws[/li] [li]WoodCutting[/li] [li]RuneCrafting[/li] [li]Worked on some Fixes[/li] [li]Fixed Running(the button packet)[/li] [li]Started Firemaking - Needs force walking and object creating (all logs work) - u
can't use fm since I've havent even started the use item[/li][/ul] I will be releasing newer and newer picturs of 06 Remake, since I love to work on the
Server and has been such an inspiration.
Pictures:
Emotions :) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg42/scaled.php?server=42&filename=emotes.png&res=medium[
/img] Cooking
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg809/scaled.php?server=809&filename=cookingkarambwan.png
&res=medium[/img] Anims
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg88/scaled.php?server=88&filename=cookingwithanims.png&r
es=medium[/img] Woodcutting [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg200/scaled.php?server=200&filename=woodcuttingj.png&res
=medium[/img] Runecrafting [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg687/scaled.php?server=687&filename=runecraftingy.png&re
s=medium[/img] Fletching with Interfaces [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg51/scaled.php?server=51&filename=fletchingwithinterface
s.png&res=medium[/img] Fletching anims, messages [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg692/scaled.php?server=692&filename=fletchinglvlup.png&r
es=medium[/img] Fishing [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg695/scaled.php?server=695&filename=fishingo.png&res=med
ium[/img] Herb cleaning [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg850/scaled.php?server=850&filename=cleaningherbs.png&re
s=medium[/img] Making potions [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg27/scaled.php?server=27&filename=potionmaking.png&res=m
edium[/img]
~Eating/Potting~
[ul][li]All Food - All working[/li] [li]Almost all Potions - none working yet[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg716/scaled.php?server=716&filename=pottingandeat
ing.png&res=medium[/img]
~Crafting gems~
[ul][li]Includes : sapphire,emerald,ruby,diamond,dragonstone and onyx[/li] [li]Level requirments[/li] [li]Animation[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg89/scaled.php?server=89&filename=gemcutting.png&
res=medium[/img] LVL Req [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg824/scaled.php?server=824&filename=craftingwithrequirme
nts.png&res=medium[/img]
~Leather Crafting~
[ul][li]Leather Crafting got just started it doesn't work yet, it only shows the
Interface by using the needle on the dhide[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg839/scaled.php?server=839&filename=fletchingscra
tch.png&res=medium[/img]
~Teleporting~
[ul][li]Proper Gfx and timer[/li] [li]Proper animation[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg717/scaled.php?server=717&filename=teleporting.p
ng&res=medium[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/k4ck7m.png[/img][b]Links[/b]
[center][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ngbtqg.png[/img][url=http://tinyurl.com/remake06][size=14pt]Register Here[/size][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ngbtqg.png[/img][/url]
[center][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/k9zyix.png[/img][url=http://tinyurl.com/remake06][size=14pt]Forums[/size][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/k9zyix.png[/img][/url] [/center]
[/center]

@Server_Sniffer wrote:

runescape sucks:

I’m pretty sure you can’t post this here unless you are releasing the client to connect to your server.

I released a link to the forums

Containing the client

item.title: 06 Remake - [ RuneScape We loved Is Back ]
item.dc:creator: @Server_Sniffer Server Sniffer
item.description:
@Server_Sniffer wrote:

[center]

Hello. Welcome to the development thread for 06 Remake. 06 Remake started out with just one

developer and then became jam packed with coders and programmers and the server is almost

complete!

Links
[center][size=14pt]Register Here[/size]

[center][size=14pt]Forums[/size]
[/center]

I`ve been working on this for a bit, and this is what I got out:

Features

[ul][li]Fishing Base[/li]
[li]WoodCutting started from scratch[/li]
[li]Full Herblore[/li]
[li]Crafting (cutting Gems/leatherCrafting needs to be worked on.) - Level reqs,

XP[/li]
[li]Prayer[/li]
[li]Fixed the shortbow glitch[/li]
[li]Fixed ground item stacking[/li]
[li]Fixed the equipment bug[/li]
[li]All emotions[/li]
[li]Teleporting[/li]
[li]Teleporting with level requirments[/li]
[li]Eating[/li]
[li]Potioning- You can drink potions and all, just need to make so it power/etc up

your skills…[/li]
[li]Animation/gfx support[/li]
[li]Few shops[/li]
[li]Npc spawns[/li]
[li]Loads global objects[/li]
[li]Started a skilling base[/li]
[li]Messaging[/li]
[li]Split Chat[/li]
[li]Wielding Level requirments[/li]
[li]PlayerEditor - edits a char file[/li]
[li]Fletching with interfaces[/li]
[li]Cooking with Interfaces, almost all raws[/li]
[li]WoodCutting[/li]
[li]RuneCrafting[/li]
[li]Worked on some Fixes[/li]
[li]Fixed Running(the button packet)[/li]
[li]Started Firemaking - Needs force walking and object creating (all logs work) - u

can’t use fm since I’ve havent even started the use item[/li][/ul]
I will be releasing newer and newer picturs of 06 Remake, since I love to work on the

Server and has been such an inspiration.

Pictures:

Emotions
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg42/scaled.php?server=42&filename=emotes.png&res=medium[

/img]
Cooking

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg809/scaled.php?server=809&filename=cookingkarambwan.png

&res=medium[/img]

es=medium[/img]
Woodcutting

=medium[/img]
Runecrafting

s=medium[/img]
Fletching with Interfaces
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg51/scaled.php?server=51&filename=fletchingwithinterface

s.png&res=medium[/img]
Fletching anims, messages
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg692/scaled.php?server=692&filename=fletchinglvlup.png&r

es=medium[/img]
Fishing
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg695/scaled.php?server=695&filename=fishingo.png&res=med

ium[/img]
Herb cleaning
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg850/scaled.php?server=850&filename=cleaningherbs.png&re

s=medium[/img]
Making potions
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg27/scaled.php?server=27&filename=potionmaking.png&res=m

edium[/img]

~Eating/Potting~

[ul][li]All Food - All working[/li]
[li]Almost all Potions - none working yet[/li][/ul]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg716/scaled.php?server=716&filename=pottingandeat

ing.png&res=medium[/img]

~Crafting gems~

[ul][li]Includes : sapphire,emerald,ruby,diamond,dragonstone and onyx[/li]
[li]Level requirments[/li]
[li]Animation[/li][/ul]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg89/scaled.php?server=89&filename=gemcutting.png&

res=medium[/img]
LVL Req
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg824/scaled.php?server=824&filename=craftingwithrequirme

nts.png&res=medium[/img]

~Leather Crafting~

[ul][li]Leather Crafting got just started it doesn’t work yet, it only shows the

Interface by using the needle on the dhide[/li][/ul]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg839/scaled.php?server=839&filename=fletchingscra

tch.png&res=medium[/img]

~Teleporting~

[ul][li]Proper Gfx and timer[/li]
[li]Proper animation[/li][/ul]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg717/scaled.php?server=717&filename=teleporting.p
